store_info.description_short: The recipe manager that allows you to manage your ever growing collection of digital recipes.
description_long: Manage your ever growing recipe collection online
Drop your collection of links and notes. Get Tandoor and never look back onto a time without recipe management, storage, sharing and collaborative cooking!
hint: At first use, you will have to create an account. This is not for security (Portal itself provides that) but because of insufficient integration.
Multi-user features are not functional yet, only you can use the app.
